content: The online request form is faster, more efficient, and reduces the chance of errors compared to manual paper-based submissions.
You can submit requests anytime, anywhere—no need to be physically present or deal with printed documents.
Each request is logged and can be tracked in real time, so you’ll always know the status and history.
Your data is securely stored and access-controlled, minimizing the risk of loss or unauthorized access.
Since approvers are instantly notified via email or in-app notifications and can take action from anywhere, the approval process is much faster.
